knimeNode.name: DL TensorFlow Network Reader
knimeNode.shortDescription: Reads a TensorFlow saved model from an input directory.

fullDescription.option: The path to the input directory that contains the TensorFlow saved model. KNIME URLs like "knime://knime.workflow/ ... <filename>" are supported.

option.name: Copy deep learning network into KNIME workflow?

fullDescription.option: If selected, the TensorFlow network will be copied into the KNIME workflow, so that it is available for export with the workflow. Otherwise, only a reference to the actual network file is used by KNIME.
